attributes.action: Save the sanity of parents across the UK and terminate the changing of clocks.
attributes.additional_details:
This year, when the clocks "Spring Forward" us mothers will be celebrating mothers day, with an hour less in bed. The irony kills me.

Additionally, our children wont be tired come their normal bedtime which will result in stress inducing hormones in parents.

I'm unsure of the scientific reasons behind this but these hormones seem to cause some kind of behaviour alteration in children. They become irrational & unpredictable, much like wild animals. 

This can continue for weeks. Please help us.
attributes.background:
An American called Benjamin Franklin came up with the idea in 1784.

He suggested that if people got up earlier, when it was lighter, then it would save on candles.

We dont use candles anymore. 

Our kids go crazy, we go crazy.

Nobody needs this level of crazy.
